00013 #include "../common/simple_vector.h"
00014 #include <list>

00016 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00017 
00023 
00027 
00028 enum pager_type
00029 {
00030   random,
00031   lru
00032 };
00033 
00035 template <unsigned npages_>
00036 class random_pager
00037 {
00038         random_number<random_uniform_fast> rnd;
00039 public:
00040         enum { n_pages = npages_ };
00041         random_pager() {};
00042         ~random_pager() {};
00043         int kick()
00044         {
00045                 return rnd(npages_);
00046         };
00047         void hit(int ipage) {};
00048 };
00049 
00051 template <unsigned npages_>
00052 class lru_pager
00053 {
00054         typedef std::list<int> list_type;
00055         
00056         list_type history;
00057         simple_vector<list_type::iterator> history_entry;
00058 public:
00059         enum { n_pages = npages_ };
00060         
00061         lru_pager(): history_entry(npages_)
00062         {
00063                 for(unsigned i=0;i<npages_;i++)
00064                         history_entry[i] = history.insert(history.end(),static_cast<int>(i));
00065         };
00066         ~lru_pager() {};
00067         int kick()
00068         {
00069                 return history.back();
00070         };
00071         void hit(int ipage)
00072         {
00073                 history.splice(history.begin(),history,history_entry[ipage]);
00074         };
00075 };
00076 
00078

00081 #endif
